SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, letter_type, number_of_days, email_subject, email_text, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, email_from, email_to, attachment_file_name, registration_letter_id FROM elp_registration_letter WHERE registration_letter_id = :registration_letter_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select REGISTRATION_LETTER_ID, dealer dealer_code, C.CODE || ' - ' || dealer_name DEALER_NAME, NUMBER_OF_DAYS, LETTER_TYPE from elp_registration_letter rl, elp_dealer edealer, elp_company c where c.company_id = edealer.company_id and rl.DEALER_ID = edealer.DEALER_ID --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause order by UPPER(DEALER_NAME), UPPER(dealer), NUMBER_OF_DAYS
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_registration_letter SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, letter_type = :letter_type, number_of_days = :number_of_days, email_subject = :email_subject, email_text = :email_text, email_from = :email_from, email_to = :email_to, attachment_file_name = :attachment_file_name, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE registration_letter_id = :registration_letter_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_registration_letter ( dealer_id, letter_type, number_of_days, email_subject, email_text, email_from, email_to, attachment_file_name, created_by, registration_letter_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :letter_type, :number_of_days, :email_subject, :email_text, :email_from, :email_to, :attachment_file_name, :created_by, :registration_letter_id )
SQL.LOAD_MAX_DAY: SELECT * from ( SELECT registration_letter_id, number_of_days FROM elp_registration_letter WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id ORDER BY number_of_days DESC ) where rownum = 1
SQL.ADD_ATTACHMENT: UPDATE elp_registration_letter SET attachment_file_data = :attachment_file_data WHERE registration_letter_id = :registration_letter_id
